[Job Title]
Part-Time Science Guide

Job Overview
Science Guides love science and really enjoy showing off their knowledge and skills. They like children and teenagers and really into showing them how science works in the real world through simple experiments.

Responsibilities and Duties
• Show and guide students simple science experiments from ages 6-14 in classes of 10-20 students
• Give feedback to students and parents about the child’s performance
• Assist in the development of educational content including notes, tests, assignments
• Supervise classes to ensure all students are learning in a safe environment
Qualifications
• Studying a Science program (Engineering, Science, Biology, etc.)
• Time management skills
• Teamwork and cooperative skills
• Works well with children and teenagers


Hours: Part-Time (3-10 hours per week) Afternoons and Weekends

Location: Tseung Kwan o

Pay: $200/Hour

Whatsapp: 64861303
